original_text: So I spake unto you; and ye would not hear, but rebelled against the commandment of the Lord, and went presumptuously up into the hill.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 말하였으나 너희가 듣지 아니하고 여호와의 명령을 거역하고 거리낌 없이 산지로 올라가매

sentences.original_text: but rebelled against the commandment of the Lord
and went presumptuously up into the hill
